Others: The Milwaukee Bucks lost their sixth consecutive game against the Cleveland Cavaliers with a score of 116-114.
Bobby Portis had a season-best performance with 21 points and 18 rebounds.
Damian Lillard scored 36 points and provided 7 assists in the game.
The Bucks played without Giannis Antetokounmpo due to a strained adductor muscle.
The Bucks are currently 1-6 in the season.
